    • isPlayerInView

      public boolean isPlayerInView(char[][] view)
      Function that checks if the Player can be seen by the bot
      Parameters:
      view - a 5x5 2D char array that contains the view of the bot
      Returns:
      playerInView returns True if Player is in the bot's view otherwise it returns false

    • randDecision

      public void randDecision(HumanPlayer player, char[][] map, Map currMap, Bot bot)
      Procedure which manages the random decision made by bot it generates a valid move
      Parameters:
      player - instance of the HumanPlayer class.
      map - 2D char array that contains the whole map.
      currMap - Instance of the class Map.
      bot - Instance of the class Bot.

    • look

      public char[][] look(int posX, int posY, char[][] map, int posBotX, int posBotY)
      Function that returns the view of the bot
      Overrides:
      look in class HumanPlayer
      Parameters:
      posX - x co-ordinate of player
      posY - y co-ordinate of player
      map - 2D char array containg the map that is being played
      posBotX - x co-ordinate of bot
      posBotY - y co-ordinate of bot
      Returns:
      view A 5x5 2D Char array of the bot's view.
